document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Take </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">all </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">away </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">from </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">but </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#58d4e8">leave </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#58d4e8">Ecstasy, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">am </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#58d4e8">richer </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">then </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Than </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">all </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">my </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#58d4e8">Fellow </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">Men </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ecff56">Ill </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#58d4e8">becometh </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#58d4e8">dwell </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">so </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#58d4e8">wealthily </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">When </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">at </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">my </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">very </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#58d4e8">Door </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">are </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">those </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#58d4e8">possessing </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">more, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">In </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#58d4e8">abject </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0e464">poverty </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Take all away from me but leave me ecstasy
